snippet: Bishop Orlando Findlayter, whose arrest last week prompted Mayor Bill de Blasio to call the police, has said nothing publicly about the controversy that has entangled the mayor.
abstract: Bishop Orlando Findlayter of Brooklyn, whose arrest after a traffic stop has turned into a political headache for New York City Mayor Bill de Blasio, leads a rousing service at New Hope Christian Fellowship, but makes no public mention of incident.
lead_paragraph: Bishop Orlando Findlayter, whose arrest last week prompted Mayor Bill de Blasio to call the police, has said nothing publicly about the controversy that has entangled the mayor.

headline.main: At Church Service, Pastor Makes No Mention of de Blasio or Arrest
headline.print_headline: At Church Service, Pastor Makes No Mention of de Blasio or Arrest
